item.title: Day01 - The Journey Begins
item.description: Everything starts here Today will officially be my first day on my journey into becoming a full time smart contract auditor. It is not my actual first day, maybe the 5th or 6th, but this first days served for a couple of things. Trainning my algortihm The other day I saw the importance of sinknig yourself into the topic you are trying to learn. In this case, Twitter is the way I started to embed myself into the world of smart contract auditing, following a bunch of well-known auditors and people in the space.
